name: The Boar's Head

reviews.text: If you like hotels that have traditional furniture rather than modern, mass produced items and if you think staff who are professional and informed (not snobby as suggested by some members!) are better than waiters who know nothing about food and its ingredients then this hotel is for you. Yes, there are more modern hotels and yes there are cheaper hotels but having travelled the world extensively and stayed in some top class hotels on business and holiday I doubt if you will find many that combine this quality and character. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely return.
reviews.title: A great hotel

likes.liked: — Look on the hotel website at teh special packages. We got an amazing deal for two adults and two children that included accomodation, breakfast and evening meal.

reviews.title: Pastries are the Best!
reviews.text: The Boar's Head Inn is a Charlottesvile institution. Although sometimes the buildings look as though they could use a fresh coat of paint and the decore does not suit my personal taste, the service is always consistant and the old mill room staff (at least the day staff) will always remember your name and what kind of juice you prefer. The rooms are not what the web site promises, but they are always clean and an appropriate temperature for the season.

reviews.title: Resort Fees
reviews.text: What I noticed most about the Boar's Head is the pastries. They are fantastic! I enjoyed what I had on the lunch buffet so much, that I came back to see what was on the evening dessert menu (unfortuntately I had to eat in the Bistro since my very expensive, linen coolots were deemed inapropriate dinner wear... although someone went in right before me in a tattered jean skirt). I had the Strawberry Experience and my husband had the Chocolate Explosion. All I can say is WOW! I had my doubts about strawberry basil frozen soufle, but that pastry chef knows what he or she is doing. My husband practically licked his plate clean!

reviews.title: what a farse
reviews.text: I'm not sure if we will stay at the Boar's Head again or not, but we will certainly come back for dessert!

reviews.title: A little less than expected
reviews.text: We stayed at the Boar's Head Inn for a wedding weekend. We had a room near the lobby. While convenient, there was little privacy. The bathroom is small but adequate.

description: Boar’s Head is a quintessential Virginia resort, offering a warm, intimate ambiance, exceptional service and unparalleled Southern hospitality. Located on a bucolic 573-acre country estate, our AAA Four Diamond resort offers 175 newly-renovated guest rooms and suites, Four Diamond dining in the Old Mill Room, a wide variety of world class recreational activities, spa and 22,000 square feet of meeting facilities for groups of 20 to 630.Owned and operated by the University of Virginia Foundation, Boar’s Head is just minutes from the University of Virginia that was founded by Thomas Jefferson, only two hours from Washington, D.C., and at the foot of the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains.
